## LinearCardContainer.setSelected() method

Set all cards to be either selected or deselected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setSelected(selected: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selected | boolean | Selection state to set all cards to. |

**Returns:**

void
